title: New: Blooms â€“ Lust
body:
Now on her third track, Irish songstress **Blooms** is beginning to truly make a name for herself, with her wistful, deeply sensual, R&B inspired tracks.

New cut, _Lust_, is the most seductive so far, again featuring production from **Sacred Animals**, and making the most of her fantastic vocal delivery.

excerpt.full: Now on her third track, Irish songstress Blooms is beginning to truly make a name for herself, with her wistful, deeply sensual, R&B inspired tracks. New cut, Lust, is the most seductive so far, again featuring production from Sacred Animals, and making the most of her fantastic vocal delivery.
excerpt.short: Now on her third track, Irish songstress Blooms is beginning to truly make a name for hers...
